qas.question: How many square meters of office space does Manhattan have?
About how many million square feet of office space is present in Midtown Manhattan?
How much office space did Manhatten possess in 2015?

context: Many of the world's largest media conglomerates are also based in the city. Manhattan contained over <a2_0>500 million square feet<a2_0/> (<a0_0>46.5 million<a0_0/> m2) of office space in 2015, making it the largest office market in the United States, while Midtown Manhattan, with nearly <a1_0>400<a1_0/> million square feet (37.2 million m2) in 2015, is the largest central business district in the world.
